title: THERE WAS A  PROBLEM FULFILLING YOUR STORE ITEMS
body:
hey so I went to the collegiate series and I got an email with 2 codes for skins through email after I went. I tried to enter them both in and neither worked Plz help. 

p.s. I triple checked spelling that is not the issue.

replies.body:
The email you got may not have been from Riot directly if it was @riotgame.com, we have a similar email we use but it is @riotgames.com (the one we use has an s in games). First, [**check the list of emails**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784) that we use and make sure that email actually came from us. 

If that email is legit, go ahead and reach out to our billing team using a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to include the codes you got, and they'll be able to check them and see what's wrong.
ok great yes it is riotgames.com lol sorry about that ill send in the ticket
p.p.s. I got the codes from kcalkins@riotgame.com
